summary: For anyone with a bug stopping them from using ovens, or who just want to bake without needing a house to do it, this takes Hearthfire oven recipes and moves them to Smelters.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod originally made for personal use, this takes all the hearthfire recipes out of the oven category, since I can\'t use ovens for some reason, so they can be baked at any smelter instead.  

Not compatible with any mods that modify Hearthfire recipes, and doesn\'t support any third party foods that might be added to ovens.
author: Kholai
